name: Y-Tech AI Chatbot

description: Efficient image optimization tool that converts images to WebP format for faster web loading. Supports bulk conversion and quality adjustment.

name: PDF Fusion

description: Specialized tool for PDF document manipulation. Split large PDFs into smaller files or merge multiple documents with page-level control.

name: Aura PDF
description: Advanced PDF reader and editor with AI-powered features. Enhanced document viewing, annotation tools, and intelligent content analysis.

name: AI Compass
description: Intelligent navigation and decision-making tool powered by AI. Provides smart recommendations and guidance for various scenarios and choices.
